content.detailedDescription: My 17 yr old son & his friend came to get me about the strange light. they said they had seen it the night before too. when i saw it it was hovering, not moving. we grabed binoculars. the light on the left was blue-ish the light on the right was red. the lights were not blinking. the light was in the se horizon. the it took off really fast & ended up in the western horizon. the sped off south & disappeared. about 30 seconds later it reappeared to the south of us. it sped to the south west very fast again & then stopped in one spot for about 20-30 seconds. then it sped off to the south & disappeaed again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: So lights hovering.  took off fast stop hover take oof in other direction. disappear then reappear. several times

content.detailedDescription:
Light and fast high and constant type satelite minutes and suddenly stopped in the middle of the sky and changed a little place and went speeding back into space in another direction.
i believe that was collecting data from our planet
content.summary: Light and fast high and constant type satelite minutes and suddenly stopped in the middle of the sky and changed a little place and went speeding back into space in another direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed room watching tv when i heard my dog outside barking like there was something out there. so i go to the kitchen window, and look out at him. he stop barking, and was looking at me ,and wagging his tail. then out of the corner of my right eye. i see something bright in the sky. at a glance i thought it was venues. then i look again, and seen it was bigger than venues would be, an i notice it was moving. so i run an got my binoculars, an went outside. it was moving from southwest to northeast. i watch it for about 5 min. it stayed a bright white the whole time. it also had a wobble to it. thru the binoculars it look like it had a aura around it. it had no sound to it. lost sight of it too many tree's.
content.summary: Went to see what my dog was barking at. out of the corner of my eye i seen something big an bright in the sky. it was moving slow,and had a wobble. there was no sound at all. it was moving from southwest to northeast. stayed a bright white never changed.

content.detailedDescription: Not much to say other than the preceeding field.
content.summary: Aircraft at a high rate of speed travelling from the west to the northeast at less than 5000 ft altitude.  again, high rate of speed and absolutely no noise.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching tv, just before 10pm, looked out my living room window, and saw bright red star like object coming from the sw.  called over my brother to look at it, then watched it approach. as it got closer, we knew it was not a plane. it was not making any noise and not flashing light.  very big and bright red.  when we went outside, it moved slightly to right, back again then to the right again, then back to straight ne direction.  when it was just above where the house is, with us underneath, it flickered it's light, which became white, three times, then shut if off completly. when flying directly above us, when it had no cloud cover, you could tell it was perfectly round in shape, large and grey like. it had some dark circles on its surface.  it flew it very straight and quick movement across the sky, and was completely covered by clouds once it passed our home.  unbelievable. i am a believer, my brother is not, but he is confused on what it is and checked to see if anyone reported it on the news. neighbors were outside and saw it too.
content.summary: Bright red star like object, zig zaged twice turned off light above neighborhood, circle shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside putting the garbage out when i observed a very bright star (or so i thought).  it was a perfectly clear night on 6/3/13 at 10:30 at night.  the light was easily the brighest 'star' in the sky, even moreso than i'd say when venus is at its brightest.  i stood admiring it for a second when i realized it was moving.  i watched it for about five minutes as it moved across the sky, moving west to east.  as it progressed i saw it pass behind trees, in my line of sight and then appear on the other side of them as it made its progression.  it continued in a straight line until it was out of sight on the eastern horizon. 

i don't know if there was any known asteroid or meteor but it didn't have a tail or a streak.  it was just really bright and moved in a straight line.  the light it gave off didn't blink or change from a steady white star-like light.  after it passed to the east i noticed a plane coming from east towards the west (towards me) with the normal blinking lights on the wings etc but it was much higher up than what i saw moving eastward.  i'm a horrible judge at size and distance and how high up something is but the thing i saw was much lower when compared with that plane i saw afterward.

i wish i could have gotten a video of it but i left my phone in the house, not expecting i'd need it to take the trash out.

if anyone is going to contact me, please do so through email.  my wife won't believe this for a second so she's unlilely to pass along any message.
content.summary: Very bright starlike light moved west to east relatively quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
June 3, 2013, mississauga, ontario. clear.

8:16pm, listening to radio while driving home, turned right from burnhamthorpe onto glen. erin dr (heading nw)

when looking up to my rear view mirror, i noticed a round star-like object object (to the left of the rear view mirror). object appears to be far and high above ground, and is reflecting light from the setting sun (west of the object). both were very bright. color cannot be judged due to high reflectivity. the size cannot be judged, but can be covered by 0.4mm diameter circle. 

8:19pm, after a slight curve on the same road, and a stop at the red light, light reflected fades. object disappears from view. object was stationary in the sky until disappearing.

hypothesis:
supernova
content.summary: Disintegrated stationary sphere-like ufo at sunset in ontario.

content.detailedDescription: We went to the beach to look at the full moon. i looked north and knew immediately that it was not an airplane, satilite or helicopter. i have been star gazing at the beach for many many years.
content.summary: Over ocean siting

content.detailedDescription: It was on 6-1-13 at around 9:45 pm. my daughter was leaving to go to the store when she looked up in the sky.  she saw the lights in the sky and came running in the house grabbing me out of the shower she threw the towel at me and said there is lights in the sky. i ran to the window where my husband was already looking out the window.  i saw these reddish orange lights that was traveling from the younwood area towards the hempfield area in a straight line. i counted 33 lights as they reached just over 136 they would go straight up into the sky out of sight. one by one. and then when it was at the end of the line there was 4 lights  two on top of the other 2  like the shape of a square they then seperated and took their turn in line to go straight up. after that there was nothing. my daughter was trying to take pictures and a video with her cell phone and it would not work.  i have never seen anything like that ever and so the next day i searched the internet what it could of been and there is nothing to explain what we had seen. the news paper said it was meteors but we know different!
content.summary: Over 30 reddish orange glowing lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Hello,two members of the family spotted one huge star-like object in a mirror around 8-9:00.So as any person would they went to look out a window on the second story of house to take a closer look and right away started videoing knowing something wierd was going on,and right then and there we knew it was a u.F.O.Which we have only seen once before around they same time at night a couple months ago.And before you know it there was a second flying object following about 30 min. later,wow is all we could think by this point...Right.  the ufos are still hovering the sky until a large flash of light fills the sky and the crafts are gone. and when we woke up that next morning there were circle marks in the parks sand box with some weird rocks. which were really warm and burnt our hands. we believe that it was element 115. we stored these rocks in a secret vault until we realized that they were mysteriously gone.
content.summary: Stayed in same spot for over an hour. when it left it made house shake and went up into the stars.

content.detailedDescription: While my boyfriend and i were walking our dog, we were looking at stars. we observed what we had at first thought was an airplane. i considered that slightly odd at first as it wasn't that high in sky and i know the local airport likes to shut down before 11pm. thus object at first appeared to be coming or way but then changed directions. the next ones seemed to start one at a time but at one time three of them formed a triangle of sorts. they seemed to disappear about a minute after entering our vision. there were more than 10 of these objects but less than 20. we have no idea what these things were just thought it was strange.
content.summary: Weird glowing ball type things. mainly one after another but a couple of them seemed to be together

content.detailedDescription: On saturday june 1/2013,i had just went to bed on the second storey in my house.I was lying in bed and had an odd feeling that i should look out the window which is beside my bed and faces north.I noticed two bright white lights flying side by side approaching from the southwest.The spheres were gradually descending at a high rate of speed.I got out of bed and went to the window.I obseved two brightly lit spheres fly to treetop level at a high rate of speed and fly past my house and eastward where i lost sight of them behind the treetops.There was no sound coming from the spheres and i believed these objects to be not from this world.I felt excited as well as frightened.It was as if i was meant to witness this event.This is the second time in my 50 years that i have witnessed a u.F.O.My entire family witnessed a flying disc while driving in our car in 1969.My father stopped the car and went into a phone booth to get a better look.The disc stopped and hovered above the car.We continued to drive home and the disc followed our car for approx.6-8 miles, and approximately 1/2 mile from our home stopped following us and took off at an extemely high rate of speed.
content.summary: Obseved two illuminated spheres out of bedroom window

content.detailedDescription:
September/october 1959.  i was in the u.S. air force stationed at whellus ab, libya, north africa.  another airman and i were walking back to the barracks after going to a movie.  the surrounding area was dark and the night sky was clear.  we were chit-chating about different things when a moving light appeared in the sky heading in the same direction we were walking (west).  we watched it disappear beyond the trees.  we turned around to see if there was anything else behind us, thinking the light must have come from that direction.  there was nothing unusual.  we discussed what we had just seen and concluded it must have been a satellite.  the light was bigger than the stars, made no sound, and appeared faster than any aircraft (jets) we had seen. there was no vapor trail illuminated by the stars.  the whole incident took about five (5) seconds.
we didn't think anything more about it until a few minutes later the light came back from beyond the trees (i can't be sure if it was the exact spot where it disappeared earlier), this time heading in a general south south east direction.  we watched it travel across the clear sky until it again disappeared, this time over the horizon.  once again there was no sound and no vapor trail that we could see.  our reaction this time was a little spooked since we were well accustomed to jet engine noise.
when we got back to the barracks, we told our friends what we saw. someone called the flight line control tower and asked if they had seen anything.  their reply was no.  in hindsight and thinking back to their location on the flight line, the light we saw would have been behind them.  and since their primary duty is to observe the flight line, it's understandable they would not have seen the light.  we did not think about asking about radar.  one other thing i can remember is someone telling us the time and we both remarked that it could not be that late.  how late?  i have no idea just that it seemed later than what time we thought it should be.
i don't recall if the light blocked out the stars.
i have since seen satellites in the sky and can say the light was bigger than a satellite and travelled much faster.  i can also say i believe the light we saw was in a much lower altitude than a satellite.
content.summary: Light east to west disappeared beyond trees.  returned heading sse disappeared horizon.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo landed in a handicap parking spot then left because they were not handicapped. they left and went east.
content.summary: It landed in a handicap parking spot

content.detailedDescription:
This is the first time i reported this, even though i have told my family and friends.  either sept. 17, 18, or 19, i was driving home alone close to midnight , possibly a little before or a little after.  i had been to a meeting and was anxious to get home. i was travelling at about 30 miles per hour on montgomery drive where it passes the spring lake area of howarth park. i often took my son and his friends there and i was very familiar, at the time with the surroundings.  from the street where i was driving, the grassy, tree-studded park was to my right and the lake, several yards beyond it.  as i was driving, i became aware of an anomaly in view.  it appeared to be a structure very similar to some type of power grid with flashing red lights.  it seemed to be stationary, fastened to the ground from where i saw it. my immediate response was that i never remembered seeing it there before. as i was trying to figure out what it was, the "object" began lifting off the ground at a jerky tilt slowly and within seconds, it was airborne. fear hadn't quite entered the picture yet, but i was a little uneasy, perhaps, and looked back at the road for a second to concentrate on driving.  suddenly the thing was on top of me! (my car, that is.) the entire road became red under its lights.  i really panicked because it was so close and for whatever reason, it had deliberately, unmistakenly headed right for me. it seemed to be hovering above my car approximately at telephone pole height. there weren't any other cars on the road, and i didn't know if i would make it out of there alive. my foot hit the pedal hard and fast and i remember getting home just a few minutes after midnight. as i walked in the door, my mother, who was watching my son was still awake.  i said, "ma, i saw a ufo!"  she just said, "oh."  i had reacted to whatever it was above my car as if i were its prey.  that was my survival gut reaction at the time even though i had always wanted to find out about ufos and of course, beings from other planets, etc. that encounter was just a little too close, however. for some reason, i felt the ufo was ours. it was just a feeling.
 there is more to this story, but i fear any subjective, rather than fact-based speculation might be foolish.  a few years later, i called "the press democrat" newspaper to see if anything had been reported.  there was an article which appeared in which local residents reported seeing strange green and blue lights that night at around 9:30, if i remember correctly. what i saw was different.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While driving home alone at @ 12 a.M. i saw red lights, like a powergrid in  the park. it began lifting, then was above my car. i panicked. the entire road was red. ufo had rows of red lights at night it was the lights that defined shape of object.

content.detailedDescription:
otra ves me toca ser testigo de apariciones en el cielo
pude ver esta esfera brillosa que queda color blanca y  como cambio de forma- estaba cerca de un avion entonces decidi fotografiarla.Veia como se alejaba rapidamente-
content.summary: Esfera brillosa tipo luz que cambio de forma tomando  color banco. estaba cerca de  un avion  con un cielo celeste             avion

content.detailedDescription: While traveling west on rt 34 in derby ct 6-1-2013 appox 22:20 pm i saw two headlight objects hovering in the air. i was comming home for the evening driving my car. i first noticed this object because of how bright it was and the fact that it was just hovering in the same spot in the sky. i certainly did not know what it was which was why i just kept looking. the object looked like two basketballs in the sky brightly lit with a cloud of light around it, it was hovering. i had no immediate feeling just wondering what the heck it is/was. i lost sight of the object after pulling into driveway when i got out of the car and looked for it it was gone.
content.summary: While traveling west on rt 34 in derby ct 6-1-2013 appox 22:20 pm i saw two headlight objects hovering in the air

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room watching tv and working on a project.  i heard a humming sound and saw a bright light and i didn't know what it was.  a bright light came in from the front window and the side kitchen window.  the kitchen window started to shake and it scared me.  i looked out the back window and saw it hovering over my house and then slowly moved off into the distance.  i would really appreciate it if someone could contact me.
content.summary: I saw a ufo over my house.

content.detailedDescription: Was in car traveling south on blue hills avenue and noticed 3 silver shaped objects in the sky in the east of me. i could not see their exact shape but could see reflective spot from the sun on their srface, and they resembled spheres turned on their sides like a bullet.There were 2 hovering a little ways apart from each other and at times appeared like they were moving, but not sure if that is the case because our car was also in motion. there was also 1 flying upward not to far away going in the opposite direction on an angle. watched for about a mile until they were no longer in view. it was beatiful clear blue sky evening.
content.summary: 3 silver bullet shaped objects in hartford, ct

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen many ufo,s so im always looking in the sky at nite. 4:00 am could not sleep went to have a smoke. looked up in the sky towards waterbury, ct and saw the orb. as always i waited to watch it fly over assuming it was a planes headlight. after it did not move for 20 mins went to get the camera. as usual batterys went dead. waited another 5 mins to make sure it was still not a plane before going back inside to get the camcorder. woke my wife up told her to go look. she came back in and said those are the same orbs we always see all over ct. by the time i got the camcorder and went outside the orb was gone. you can check this link out also. this is a report i made in 2008. [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

sorry mufon but i believe you people r part of the us government. 
i have 3 kids and a mortgage and dont have time to run to my computer every time i see a ufo. the orange orbs that pulsate a rainbow plasma in the center are consistently in the skys over ct. i have seen silver orbs like pinballs in the clouds in the daytime and the huge ship i saw in 2008. i have many images and videos but also many hobbies. it is so obvious that these orbs are constantly in the skys over ct so why will you people not admit to them. i have also experienced one close up but do you really think im going to tell people? they think its crazy. i was also followed  by a craft 2 years ago around 6:00 in the morning. im to lazy to type this crap so if you ever want to see my images or interview me it fine. i dont want to be on tv. i do have lots of evidence but like i said i am lazy. just so you people know that prospect ct has tons of activity at nite. all kinds of jets, choppers, planes lots of military.  im also now convinced that ufo and paranormal r connected.
content.summary: Same orbs that i have watched from short beach in stratford ct over li sound

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting at a camp fire near hillbilly's campground at 18018 hwy j, monroe city, mo 63456. there were about ten of us. my back was to the object when someone said "what the hell is that?" we all turned and saw six reddish orange lights flying in formation coming out of a cloud with lightning flashes at its rear. the object emerged and hovered in place. on one end of the object there were three of the lights/objects {on the left}in a downward "v" shaped formation. the other end {right side} they were in a perfect horizontal line. the object{s}hovered noiselessly for four to five minutes and then moved back into the cloud as it disappeared. we all tried to photograph and video the objects but they did not show up on the photos or in the video! people further away in the campground approached us asking if we saw the objects. we were all amazed and convinced that we had seen a ufo. i am a retired police officer, i have never seen a ufo and i am convinced that this was one! you may contact me for additional details.
content.summary: 6 objects flying in formation or attached to a large object

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were on the island of grand cayman sitting on 7 mile beach in the evening looking for shooting stars.It was a dark and moonless night with stars covering the night sky. there were minimal lights on the beach which allowed us a clear view of the night sky. at approximately 11:00 pm, my girlfriend said "whats that? i happened to be looking in the same diection and immediately answered, i dont't know. what we observed almost simultaneously was a dark shadow, very large, moving across the sky in a northerly direction, obscuring all of light from the stars as it passed by. after about 3 seconds, the shadow transfomed into a craft, which was visible for about 3-4 seconds and then seemed to cloak itself back into a dark shadow, as if becoming one with the surrounding sky and was gone. after it had disappeared, i asked my girlfriend to describe what she saw, since we both had a startled verbal response when we saw the craft materialize. what we saw was a large craft, that i estimated to be the size of a couple of boing 747 aircraft, i am guessing to be at 5-10,000 feet in altitude, moving off to the north at a reletively high rate of speed, of at least several thousand miles per hour. the craft originally was the dark shadow we saw moving across the sky, and then began to materialize. the cfaft as i saw it was of a similar shape as the " bird of prey" from the star trek shows. i saw gull shape wings which had a solid navigation light running almost the entire length of the leading edge of the wings. it had no tail fin but in general was of a chevron shape.It made no sound, and had no other discernable lights. it appeared to have a protrusion off the front, which i would assume to be a cockpit type of area. my girlfriend described the craft as more of a "v" shaped craft, looking similar to a seagull without the head area and she did see the light on its edges, more of which she descibed as a glowing light. my eyes are much better than hers at distance, so i believe i got a better look at it. this craft stayed in our view for 3-4 seconds, and then in a very similar fashion from the creature in the movie "predator", it seemed to dematerialize into the surrounding sky, or just get absorbed by it. we both talked about it in detail for days. we both saw that craft on that night, and know that what we saw was real. we talked about how if only one of us saw it, you would question yourself forever, if you just imagined something. in this case 2 sets of eyes and 2 minds saw exactly the same thing, so we will forever know the opposite. we witnessed a craft more than likely, not of this earth.
content.summary: Observed shadow in sky which transformed into a craft then again a shadow which  then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were outside of my work sunday night and i saw a really bright star, but as i looked at it it didn't seem quite right- then we noticed more star-like lights appearing near the first one i saw, starting small and dim- then glowing(with a sort of flicker).  we all watched as the first one looked as though it was falling to the ground... i was seeing things right? falling star surely... but it wasn't... more and more appeared all around the sky some moving over us in the sky some in the distance, but surrounding us above.

at first we thought some sort of bombs were being released or something, it couldn't possible be a real ufo... no... i'm seeing things....I'd believe a nuclear attack in kansas before multiple ufo's above us.

but they kept moving... 

some of them would sit in place for a while (two beside each other sat for at least an hour in the same spot then could be seen moving slightly to the left and the one beside it following.)  then i really began to take notice of what was happening.  they were positioning themselves in certain spots, almost a triangle theme... there were at least 20-30 throughout the night, some just passed overhead and flew passed above, others took their place in the sky (some moving their positions, others just slightly moving, and some even falling slowly to the ground.

i stared directly above and yelled for the others to look.  a triangle shaped object with 3 white lights at each corner and one red between the two on the back of it.  it flew faster than any plane ever could, and i heard no noise.  nothing. glowing star... much brighter than everything around them.  what was happening.  

just glancing at the sky anybody would believe those were stars, but staring over the span of 2 hours showed that no star could ever do that, move...Disappear... 

we left to go back to my apartment then forgot one of us had left our car  where  we were, so we returned to get it.  on the way i noticed something i had never really seen before... birds.... flying so low, so many of them.  they never do that.  100's flying so low.... at 12am? that's not right... not like that....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a glowing light appear, thought it was a star- more appeared.  saw triangle shaped ufo, 3 white lights, birds acting strange.  triangle-like formations- like they were positioning themselves... lasted 1.5-2 hours

content.detailedDescription:
I would like to start out with that i have been an abductee for many years. i have had numerous encounters my entire life starting as a child to the present day. i have many other events i could tell but this is the one that stands out because of the scenario. the difference in this event is the fact that i was fully awake and conscious. unlike most abductions where i am in a haze disillusioned state most likely due to the techniques used by the abductors. no i am not crazy. 

the incident started in the middle of the night at about 3am. i was in bed sleeping flat on my stomach. i was not fully asleep but groggy. the next thing is i felt something touch my left ankle. did not think much of it until the touch turned into a grip on my ankle. my leg was lifted into the air. startled i spun around and instantly went into a panic mode. there standing holding my leg was an entity commonly referred to as the greys. off subject i am a gun enthusiast and own many firearms. i sleep with a firearm near me. at the time i had a small 25 cal. pistol in a drawer near my bed. when i saw the entity i panicked and instinctively grabbed for my pistol. i pulled my pistol and aimed it at the entity at which time he dropped my leg. he turned and ran out of my room. this all took place in a matter of seconds. my kitchen was the next room to my bedroom. in the kitchen was my dog. i kept her in the kitchen at the time because she was having issues with peeing on the carpet. when the entity ran from my room i heard my dog scream in fear as if she was being beaten. the sound a dog makes when they are in severe pain or fear. i got up and ran in the kitchen. there was the entity standing by the kitchen wall with my dog about 5 feet from him yelping and crying really loud. i again aimed my pistol at the entity. he stared at me and i froze for a few seconds. i was just ready to pull the trigger when he turned and went right through the wall as if it was not there. i slowly walked in the kitchen at which time my dog stopped yelping but was still crying and extremely scared. i slowly walked over to the wall and noticed a slight rippling effect on the wall that looked like heat waves like on a hot day when you see heat coming off of hot pavement. i touched the spot on the wall where the entity went through and it was very hot. i stood there for a minute and touched it again and it had cooled back to normal. here i was standing in the middle of my kitchen with a pistol in my hand thinking i cant believe what the hell just happened. i was in shock and just stood there for a few minutes. the next thing i did was i picked up the phone and called my uncle and told him what just happened. you have to remember this was 3am and he was not in a good mood to here something like this at that time in the morning. but after hearing what happened he came over. i let him in the back as that is where i was because the back door to the home was in the kitchen. he came in and we talked for a few minutes as he was trying to calm me down. he then went into the living room and told me come in the living room. he said look at the floor so i did. i could not believe what i saw. there was little child sized footprints on my living room carpet. i had vacuumed the carpet earlier before i went to bed so the carpet was all raised. but there on the floor was child sized footprints. not barefoot but shoed prints. my uncle was shocked and was a little scared after seeing the prints. this is one of many incidents that i have had with the grey entities. as i said this one is different because i was fully awake and aware as i am now writing this piece.
content.summary: Failed abduction attempt.

content.detailedDescription: This happened on saturday night (6/1/13) at approximately 8:30 pm.  we were traveling north on mcqueen road and stopped at the intersection of mcqueen and riggs road in chandler, az.  i was sitting in the passenger seat and noticed multiple orbs flying low in the sky from the north to the southeast. i quickly jumped out of the truck to capture a video of the event. the video does not do what we witnessed in person any justice.  it's hard to tell from the video but these lights were orange/reddish in color and we could not hear any sound coming from them.  as they flew by us towards the east more started to appear from the north.   i shot 1 minute and 40 seconds before we headed back to the truck to follow them.  it took maybe 30-45 seconds to get back onto riggs road heading east and by then all of the lights had completely disappeared.
content.summary: Multiple bright red/orange orbs of light were traveling in loose formation in chandler az sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in our backyard looking at stars toward the ne. when this object came out of nowhere by a star, it was a very bright blue/white glow. i thought at first that it was a satellite, but this was large and traveled slow compared to satellites that i have seen before that were small and fast. there was no blinking lights like a plane would have. this bright glow traveled ne until we could not see it anymore. my wife and i were surprised at what we just seen. i hope others seen this too, would like to know what it was.
content.summary: Was looking at stars when this came out of nowhere and moved slow

content.detailedDescription: We were hanging out by the pool and my husband called me over to look at something. he pointed straight up and there was an object that was hovering. it looked white at first, but then it would dim out and then flash, like it was reflecting the sun (which was setting). we were all just confused and in awe. we went over what it could be, a balloon (no, because it was stationary) a plane (wasn't moving, helicopter (too high). we watched this object for up to 20 minutes before it just disappeared.  no one felt anything weird, except i started seeing "specs" in my vision, but i chalk it up to looking straight up for almost a half an hour. i don't think it was related more than that.
content.summary: Hovering, metallic entity that was witnessed by multiple people for up to 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture of something near vancouver airport. i thoght it was a paraglider, but later i copied the picture into my computer and found it was not.
content.summary: I don't know what was taken a pricture by me

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were driving north on s. main st. at around 8:45pm on may 13th, 2013. at first, i thought it was an orange street lamp flickering between the trees. trees line the road mostly, obscuring the view of the sky. however, when we could clearly see the sky, i noticed it was much farther away and high in the sky. my boyfriend saw it as well. we drove slowly to keep watching it. 

it appeared to be like a fireball. it descended slowly then leveled off and traveled east. the path was not very long, and it did not move much in the sky. from our distance, it only looked like it moved a few inches total (it did not move across the sky, but slowly in a similar area.) 

at first, we thought it might be something coming into the atmosphere (some sort of meteor because it appeared to be on fire, though there was not much of a tail.) it was falling, but then it stopped descending and started to move east (or to the right.) that was when we started to question what it was even more. we were not frightened or uneasy, but excited and curious. 

we reached the small downtown area where there was a lot of streetlights, so it was becoming more difficult to see. i headed west on il 64 to try and head to where there was less light and more open space. the object was now mostly behind us in the sky, so we had trouble seeing it again. 

once we reached peace rd, i turned right (headed more north again, so it would be east of us, or to our right) and we were unable to find it again in the sky. we proceeded to our destination in town and back home within the next 30 minutes and kept our eyes out for it, but never saw it again.
content.summary: Glowing orange fireball like object seen in sky

content.detailedDescription:
On june 1, 2013 i was out walking the dog and noticed how clear the sky was, so was looking up at the stars.  it was sometime between 10:20 and 10:30 pm when i saw what i thought to be a satellite moving across the sky.  when i first noticed it, i was looking nw at about 80 degrees from the horizon. it was bluish white in color with the brightness of a dim star, moving at a constant speed from north toward south.  there was no evidence of any flashing lights such as one would see coming from a plane, hence my assumption it was a satellite.  after a few seconds, it dimmed as satellites will typically do, but after losing sight of it for only a second, i was slightly surprised to see it brighten back to its original brightness.  it was still moving straight at the same speed and along the same path as before.  i was then even more surprised when i noticed it started to curve to the west, and then accelerate rapidly to the speed of a shooting star as it finished its turn westward.  it faded quickly as it accelerated westward.  the sighting of this object occurred within a span of about 30 to 45 seconds.

i was still looking to the west where the first object disappeared, at about 60 degrees from the horizon, when 5 to 10 seconds later i noticed another moving object that also looked like a satellite, with the same color and brightness of a dim star.  this object was slightly to the north of where the first object had disappeared and was moving west to east, at a constant speed typical of a satellite. it is my assumption that this is not the same object as the first one.  i would have thought this was just a satellite if it hadn't been for the movement of the first object i had just witnessed.  i watched the second object for one to two minutes.  it passed overhead and stayed on a straight path at a constant speed for the duration, then dimmed and faded from sight at about 45 degrees from the horizon looking east.  this second object was not remarkable and acted exactly like a satellite, but because of the first object i figure it is worth reporting.

i continued walking the dog and looking at the skies for about 20 to 25 more minutes, but saw nothing else unusual.  there were several planes passing during this time, with their telltale blinking lights, but no other satellite or ufo sightings.
content.summary: First object looked like a satellite, but changed direction and speed.  second object may have been satellite, it had straight path and constant speed.
